metadata.description: Nice ass! I like it! Those were the words of the designer Eiji Shiroyama. "Help me with my work". If I can be of help to the popular designer of my favourite brand... He got me to take of my clothes in the office after hours and I was wearing only underwear! He touched my ass and boobs and his finger traced along my V-line... It's a short story, panty-loving and wet!
metadata.name: Working Overtime in Underwear – A Touching Design
